lead_paragraph: Although the acting can be wooden at times, ‘Pali Road’ is a decent film set in a gorgeous locale.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Pali Road’ Blends Romance and Suspense
headline.main: Review: ‘Pali Road’ Blends Romance and Suspense

snippet: Although the acting can be wooden at times, ‘Pali Road’ is a decent film set in a gorgeous locale.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews movie Pali Road, directed by Jonathan Lim and starring Michelle Chen.
